pullrequest.title: Added the possibility to specify additional URI resolvers based on URI scheme.

content.raw:
Thanks for your comments. As I stated in the PR, I'm afraid it really breaks ABI. But as I don't fully understand it, I wanted to have it confirmed from you. So I'm going to retarget to default.

One comment - http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=contrib_code&cat=development should IMO contain this decision guide - "if your change is going to break ABI, base your changes on default, otherwise base them on gazeboX or whatever".
